member.name: T:Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator
member.summary: Class for calculation math expressions defined as string.

remarks.para: Features: - Operators: * / + - ^. - Brackets support. - Basic math functions: Abs( x ), Acos( x ), Asin( x ), Atan( x ), Atan2( y, x ), Ceiling( x ), Cos( x ), Cosh( x ), Exp( x ), Floor( x ), Log( x ), Log10( x ), Max( v1, v2 ), Min( v1, v2 ), Pow( x, y ), Round( x ), Sign( x ), Sin( x ), Sqrt( x ), Tan( x ), Tanh( x ). - User defined functions. - Parameters.

member.name: M:Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator.GetFunction(System.String)
member.summary: Get function by the name.

member.name: M:Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator.RegisterFunction(System.String,Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator.FunctionDelegate,System.Int32)
member.summary: Registers function.

member.name: M:Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator.Prepare(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.String},System.String@)
member.summary: Prepares expression for faster calculation. Use when you need calculate one expression with different parameters many times.

member.name: M:Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator.Calculate(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Double},System.Double@,System.String@)
member.summary: Calculates expression. Example: "1 + (2 * 3)", "5 * x + y".

member.name: M:Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator.RegisterBasicMathFunctions
member.summary: Registers basic math functions.
member.remarks: Supported functions: Abs( x ), Acos( x ), Asin( x ), Atan( x ), Atan2( y, x ), Ceiling( x ), Cos( x ), Cosh( x ), Exp( x ), Floor( x ), Log( x ), Log10( x ), Max( v1, v2 ), Min( v1, v2 ), Pow( x, y ), Round( x ), Sign( x ), Sin( x ), Sqrt( x ), Tan( x ), Tanh( x ).

member.name: P:Engine.MathEx.ExpressionCalculator.Functions
member.summary: Gets list of defined functions.
